name: Kelly Lind
biography: Kelly Lind is known for her work on Deja Vu (2006), The Devil All the Time (2020) and The Big Short (2015).::Anonymous
trivia: Has spent at least one month on every continent and worked for 8 months in Antarctica.
Champion of "Trivial Pursuit: America Plays" hosted by Christopher Knight.
Her first job on a major Hollywood film was as Sean Penn's assistant in All the King's Men.
Her godmother is the mother of best selling author Michael Lewis.
filmography: Oh Ship! It's a Family Trip
